participant_1.background:
I caught a huge fish on my last fishing trip!
i like to sing.
i am 17.
i have two adopted kids.
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.

participant_2.background:
I will not force my musical taste on others, but they are welcome to listen to it if they want.
i was the first born child.
i own a french bulldog.
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.
i am the leader of the french fry research department at del taco.

content.text: I'm doing well! How are you today?
I'm doing good, thank you! I just got back from a fishing trip and I caught a huge fish! How about you?
That's awesome! I'm not much of a fisherman myself, but I like to go out on the boat sometimes. What kind of fish did you catch?
I caught a huge bass! It was so much fun!
That's awesome! I'm glad you had a good time!
Thanks! Me too! I love fishing.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm more of a music person myself. I'm the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco!
That's awesome! I love French fries! What's your favorite kind of music?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably rock and roll. I also like to go to concerts.
That's awesome! I love going to concerts too! What's your favorite concert that you've ever been to?
My favorite concert was probably when I saw the Rolling Stones a few years ago. It was so much fun!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to see the Rolling Stones!
I'm sure they are! I'm glad you had a good time!
